page.title: 14Services in Kirtlington
page.content: The life style of people in Kirtlington is indicated by the following statistics: 89.9% of Kirtlington households have a telephone. There is a doctors' surgery held in the village hall 4 times every week. This service is used by 71.6% of people in the village. Most households use a combination of fuels to heat their homes. For part of their heating 48.4% use coal or coke, 45.2% use oil, 56.8% use electricity, 19.4% use bottled gas and 13.6% use some other fuel. There is no mains gas provision in Kirtlington. The Post Office is used daily by 7.1% of villagers, weekly by 36.4%, monthly by 6.3% but never by 4.8%. The garage is used daily by 1.1%, weekly by 21.9%, monthly by 10.3% and never by 13.8%.
